name: Dragon's Prey (Halfondarr)
description:
Don't take this game seriously...

Dragon's Prey was my game project when I started learning Unity, just after my studies.
It's an odd looking, and  little weird prototype but it's cool for me to keep it here, for the record. I still love it, deeply.

It's kind of a """metroidvania""", where you play a dragon and shoot at dwarves that imprisoned you in a deep cave. Kill all the dwarves to reach the end.

 Have fun with it if you will !

Halfondarr

Note, this game was already uploaded on an old account of mine. This old account will be deleted soon, so I re-uploaded Dragon's Prey here.
